cause.description:
Cancer is an illness that does no yet have a cure. thousands of people are ding from it or are yet to die from it. Cancer can occure in many places of the body. Eventually cancer destroyes the life of the patient and the lives of their family members. Help find a cure for cancer and help fight it off. Your support and donations are highly appreciated.
1. More money should be put forth for cancer research.
2. there should be lower wait times.
3. People should be educated more about cancer prevention.
cause.mission: fight cancer and stop it from destroying thousands of lives.
cause.name: FIGHT CANCER
